reg_pit.title:
Extraprovincial Corporations Disclosure of
Information Regulation

change.changenote: Section 2 (a) (part) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 219/2019, effective November 1, 2019.

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: to provide to the commission, the superintendent or any person acting under the direction of either of them,

change.changenote: Section 2 (part) and (a) BEFORE amended by BC Reg 208/2021, effective August 1, 2021.
change.bcl:text: It is a condition of every business authorization issued to an extraprovincial corporation that the extraprovincial corporation permit persons charged with the administration or enforcement, or the administration and enforcement of comparable legislation

bcl:paragraph.bcl:text: to provide to the Authority, the superintendent or any person acting under the direction of either of them,
relating to the extraprovincial corporation, and
